document.topic_text: Print A heavenly sale St. Julies’ Helping Hands Ministry will host the annual Indoor Parking Lot Sale from 9 a.m. to 6 p.m. Sat., Aug. 13 and from 9 a.m. to 1 p.m. Sun., Aug. 14 in the air-conditioned parish hall, 2475 Borchard Road, Newbury Park. Admission is free. Seniors and the disabled can shop 4:30 to 6 p.m. Fri., Aug. 12. Helping Hands Ministry offers services such as visiting shut-ins, assisting new mothers, providing meals, handyman work, transportation and bereavement support. Call (805) 498-7377.
